app.name: Change Ticket Requester on Save
app.short_description: Changes ticket requester with a ticket.save event.
app.long_description: First, the user is created or updated. If that is successful it then changes the ticket requester with a ticket.save event.
app.installation_instructions: Click install. If you want to change the user that is being created or updated, make those changes on lines 20-21 in iframe.html.
